description.value: You move strategically forward to draw the enemy's attention away from your allies. You Stride toward an enemy and attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Create a Diversion], except you can use Society or Warfare Lore instead of Deception. On a success, in addition to the normal outcome for Creating a Diversion, the enemy becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fascinated] with you until the start of your next turn and can't use reactions against allies in your aura. On a critical success, the enemy becomes fascinated with you until the end of your next turn.
